subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Heather O’Reilly had a goal and an assist to lead the United States to a 2-0 victory over Japan in Cary, N.C., in the Americans’ next-to-last exhibition before the Women’s World Cup next month in Germany.
snippet: Heather O’Reilly had a goal and an assist to lead the United States to a 2-0 victory over Japan in Cary, N.C., in the Americans’ next-to-last exhibition before the Women’s World Cup next month in Germany.
